title: Bump the skiasharp group with 8 updates
body:
Bumps the skiasharp group with 8 updates: | Package | From | To | | --- | --- | --- | | [SkiaSharp](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.1` | `2.88.4` | | [SkiaSharp.Skottie](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.1` | `2.88.4` | | [SkiaSharp.Views.Forms](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.1` | `2.88.4` | | [SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.Linux](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.1` | `2.88.4` | | [SkiaSharp.Views.Forms.WPF](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.1` | `2.88.4` | | [SkiaSharp.Views](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.1` | `2.88.4` | | [SkiaSharp.Views.WPF](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.1` | `2.88.4` | | [SkiaSharp.Views.Maui.Controls](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.1` | `2.88.4` | Updates `SkiaSharp` from 2.88.1 to 2.88.4
Release notes

Sourced from SkiaSharp's releases.

Version 2.88.4

What's Changed

  • Removing all .NET 5 SDK requirements by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2266
  • Force an older version of the Windows SDK by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2273
  • Update Windows App SDK by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2276
  • feat(wasm): Add mt and mt+simd, fix harfbuzz for emsdk 3.1.12 by @​jeromelaban in mono/SkiaSharp#2286
  • Use the latest versions of some NuGets and SDKs by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2301
  • Enable CodeQL by @​Redth in mono/SkiaSharp#2303
  • Update some more NuGets by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2304
  • [Tizen] Fixes Canvas Size calculation by @​myroot in mono/SkiaSharp#2322
  • [ci] Add exclusions for PoliCheck and CredScan by @​pjcollins in mono/SkiaSharp#2389
  • [ci] Use default feed to install the .NET SDK by @​pjcollins in mono/SkiaSharp#2393
  • Set Uno iOS SKSwapChainPanel to non-opaque for consistency by @​roubachof in mono/SkiaSharp#2401
  • Update SKSwapChainPanel.Android.cs by @​roubachof in mono/SkiaSharp#2400
  • [Uno] Default Opaque to false for SKXamlCanvas on MacOS and iOS by @​roubachof in mono/SkiaSharp#2398
  • Use the correct method for setting Opaque on macOS by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2477
  • Switch to Debian archives by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2476
  • Use the new XHarness .NET tool and latest .NET 6 MAUI by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2478
  • Add $schema to cgmanifest.json by @​JamieMagee in mono/SkiaSharp#2232
  • Skip updating GitHub status when no token is available by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2479
  • Add a manual, full-run pipeline by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2480
  • Ship the .aar with the NuGet for android by @​dellis1972 in mono/SkiaSharp#2465
  • Update Cake files to override deployment targets by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2482
  • Update zlib to 1.2.13 by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2484
  • Install a specific Tizen version by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2486
  • Install .NET 7 by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2485
  • chore: Add support for .NET 8 Preview 4 by @​jeromelaban in mono/SkiaSharp#2457
  • [Android] Additional check to avoid ObjectDisposedException by @​FoggyFinder in mono/SkiaSharp#2313
  • Fix SKCanvasView dispose exception when the view is disposed before it's rendered by @​jjzhang12 in mono/SkiaSharp#2472
  • Update bitmap SKAlphaType in SKXamlCanvas.Wasm.cs by @​roubachof in mono/SkiaSharp#2443
  • Use the new DownloadBuildArtifacts task by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2489
  • Update a few dependencies by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2487
  • Run cve-bin-tool by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2490
  • Update macOS and Xcode by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2425
  • Add a .NET iOS & Mac Catalyst sample and .NET "Core" sample support by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2491
  • Support for ARM64 macOS Machines by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2468
  • Improve performance of hex string parsing in SKColor by @​jwikberg in mono/SkiaSharp#2467
  • fix(wasm): Enable Wasm EH and SIMD in all configurations for net8+ by @​jeromelaban in mono/SkiaSharp#2495
  • Include the new WASM assets in Blazor for .NET 8 by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2497
  • Update Cake to the latest 2.x version by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2500
  • Pack the iossimulator RID artifacts by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2498
  • Fixed ToRect extension method extension by @​niza93 in mono/SkiaSharp#2392
  • feat: Move to JSImport for WinUI Target on net7.0 by @​jeromelaban in mono/SkiaSharp#2428
  • fix: Adjust net7.0-* resolution for Uno.WinUI targets by @​jeromelaban in mono/SkiaSharp#2503
  • Update libpng to v1.6.40 and libexpat to 2.5.0+more by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2510
  • fix: Disambiguate SKGLView for uno and maui targets by @​jeromelaban in mono/SkiaSharp#2529
  • Removing nesting levels through block-scoped using statement by @​Lehonti in mono/SkiaSharp#2528
  • Fix CI by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2554
  • Include the NativeReference for Hot Restart by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2553
  • [release/2.x] Try and follow more dotnet versions by @​github-actions in mono/SkiaSharp#2557

... (truncated)

Commits
  • b0b717a Force to use a higher build number
  • c9bb687 Force a higher build number
  • d78ce6e Fix the file version to match the actual version
  • fa401b9 Try and follow more dotnet versions (#2556) (#2557)
  • 09d15f8 Include the NativeReference for Hot Restart (#2553)
  • f26cd47 Skip the .NET 7.0.4xx installs (#2554)
  • 7d77665 Removing nesting levels through block-scoped using statement (#2528)
  • 402c298 fix: Disambiguate SKGLView for uno and maui targets (#2529)
  • 7646bc1 Update libpng to v1.6.40 and libexpat to 2.5.0+more (#2510)
  • 936270b fix: Adjust net7.0-* resolution for Uno.WinUI targets (#2503)
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view
